title: Land Travel Calculator Template
description: Calculates realistic land travel times using terrain modifiers. Walking human baseline: 12 miles/day. Terrain modifiers significantly affect travel time (heavy forest cuts speed by 66%).

modifier_percent.description: Speed reduction: road 0%, light forest 15%, heavy forest 66%, hills 25%, mountains 50%, desert/swamp 33%

terrain_segments.description: Terrain breakdown between origin and destination

base_speed_miles_per_day.description: Walking 12, horse 35, wagon 18, carrier pigeon 700, dragon 360
